name: A Gleam In The Dark
description:
Have you ever wanted to walk around in a forest filled with starving wolves at night? Well this game is made for you! In A Gleam in the Dark you will have to cross the forest with a torch lighting up campfires and other stuff to protect yourself from predators. But remember, as wolves are afraid of light, your torch is your best friend so you’d better keep it alive…

How to play
- Left Click to set fire to campfires, wood and wolves
- Right Click to pick up wood and to add wood to campfires
- Escape to pause the game

we advise you yo play the windows version of the game for better visuals.

Credits
- Programmation : Quentin de Capèle
- Art : Victor Lebrun
- Game Design, Level Design : Firmin Rousseau
- Music : Alexandre Destainville
